title: Screen keeps shaking when using rear camera on my Pixel 4a. Bought on Amazon and how to get warranty
content:
Screen keeps shaking when using rear camera on my Pixel 4a. Sample video here > 

https://onedrive.live.com/?authkey=%21ADdEgMN26xycaPE&cid=0B436DD5236F9F36&id=B436DD5236F9F36%2176328&parId=B436DD5236F9F36%21109&o=OneUp

Tried to clear Camera app cache, update the phone but all have no luck.  Seems to be a hardware issue with the OIS.  

Bought this on Amazon in Aug and would like to know how to get my warranty?
